caption.title: Retraction dynamics and expansion of the distribution area of Ceratophrys ornata, according to the niche modeling method.
caption.p: Last interglacial (A); Last glacial maximum (B) and Current (C). (A): 22,657 km 2; (B): 54,701 km 2 and (C): 25,563 km 2. Distribution areas indicated in the extreme south of the continent may be due to analysis artifacts resulting from Grinnellian niche concept. Training data: AUC = 0.994 (A); AUC = 0.982 (B) and AUC = 0.991 (C). Test data: AUC = 0.991 (A); AUC = 0.988 (B) and AUC = 0.984 (C).
Click here for additional data file.
